product_name: SmartWool Jovian Grid Socks - Men's 2013 - Closeout
long_description: Soft merino wool, medium cushioning and a fun design make the SmartWool Jovian Grid Socks a happy choice for everyday casual wear. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Elastane stretch delivers all-day comfort and helps keep socks in place. Medium cushioning in the heel and forefoot area delivers comfort and durablity for all-day wear. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Closeout.
short_description: Soft merino wool, medium cushioning and a fun design make the SmartWool Jovian Grid Socks a happy choice for everyday casual wear.
